tool_description: Validates bibliography sections by cross-referencing with in-text citations, checking completeness, and ensuring proper alphabetical ordering.

bibliography_entries.description: List of bibliography entries to validate

in_text_citations.description: List of in-text citations to cross-reference

citation_style.description: Citation style being used: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, or Vancouver

check_completeness.description: Whether to check for missing required fields

error_messages: Empty bibliography: Provide at least one bibliography entry.
Empty citations list: Provide at least one in-text citation.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
Bibliography too large: Maximum 500 bibliography entries allowed.
Citations list too large: Maximum 1000 in-text citations allowed.
usage: Provide bibliography_entries, in_text_citations, and citation_style to validate bibliography completeness and cross-references.

validation_passed.description: Whether the bibliography validation passed overall

missing_references.description: In-text citations without corresponding bibliography entries

unused_references.description: Bibliography entries not cited in text

ordering_issues.description: Bibliography entries that are out of alphabetical order
